title: GEMeX: A Large-Scale, Groundable, and Explainable Medical VQA Benchmark for Chest X-ray Diagnosis
details: B Liu, K Zou, L Zhan, Z Lu, X Dong, Y Chen, C Xie… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2024
abstract: Medical Visual Question Answering (VQA) is an essential technology that integrates computer vision and natural language processing to automatically respond to clinical inquiries about medical images. However, current medical VQA datasets exhibit two …
